name: PHI Breach Risk Assessment by HSO
description: Sends PHI risk assessment information to HSO (HIPAA Security Officer) for review and receives confirmation on whether the breach is reportable to relevant federal or law enforcement agencies.

resource.content:
HSO assessment of PHI Breach Report is completed.

 

HSO Assessment Summary

  • This is a Valid PHI Breach Incident
  • {% if vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_HSO.input.impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers in ['High'] %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at High risk. Hence, need to be communicated about the breach.{% elif vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_HSO.input.impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers in ['Medium'] %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at Medium risk. Hence, need to be communicated about the breach.
  • {% else %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at Low risk.{% endif %}
  • {% if vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_HSO.input.isReportDpoApproved == 'Approved' %}Data Breach Report has been Approved by HSO{% else %}Data Breach Report has been Rejected by HSO{% endif %}

message.content: The PHI Breach Report has been sent to HSO for review.
